GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
kcm: annotate data-races around kcm->rx_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit 62086d1c4602e4f2ec07b975165afc2ed0ff1be9, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.
